label: Notes
description: Each stuffy plays a different musical note when you hold down its button. The stuffies can be arranged from low to high to create a musical scale, or lined up to play a melody together.

label: Shake
description: Shake a stuffy and watch its lights fill up. Gentle shakes light up just a few LEDs, while harder shakes fill up the whole ring. Each stuffy glows in its own random color. Press the button to start over.

label: Hot/Cold
description: Hide one component (stuffy, button, or splat) somewhere in the space. The other stuffies show how close they are to the hidden one using red lights - more lights mean farther away, fewer lights mean getting closer. It works like a game of "hot and cold" but the stuffies tell you instead of a person.

label: Jump
description: Hold a stuffy while jumping and it counts each jump with its lights. The lights fill up one by one, keeping track up to 12 jumps before starting over. Press the button to reset the count.

label: Clap
description: Send this signal from the web app and stuffies that are close enough to the hub will buzz. This shows how far the wireless signal reaches - perfect for understanding which stuffies can "hear" the hub from different spots in the room or playground.

label: Rainbow
description: All stuffies within range show their battery level in green, then light up with a rainbow pattern at the same time. Use it to get everyone's attention or as a celebration for the whole group.

label: Off
description: Puts stuffies to sleep to save battery when not in use. The red lights flash as a warning - hold the button to keep it awake, or let it go to sleep. Press the button again later to wake it back up.
